title: Highly Tourist Zoned Land for Sale Kahawa, Akurala
details:
Highly Tourist Zoned Land for Sale in Kahawa, Akurala. Only 1 Km inland from the Galle Road. Close to nature away from the hustle. Ideal for a holiday villa targeting tourist industry.
7 Km (16min) away from Ambalangoda Town and 30km away from Galle Town
2 adjoining land plots (Looking for one buyer for both plots)
